name: LPMD_S_XML_IGNORE_ITMT
summary: Change default xml configuration to ignore ITMT by setting 1 in <IgnoreITMT>0</IgnoreITMT>, to perform low power mode force enter, force exit, auto enter lpm, survivability mode enter, survivability mode exit and terminate, then verify if not showing perform ITMT from debug log, also verify if all the activity patterns are correct from debug logs
